comment:
Overall his CAE class is pretty easy
He doesn't teach you at all, you just have to read the book and follow the steps.
You must purchase two $40 books which there are no free copies online
The exams are really easy and he is not a harsh grader
Of the two homeworks, the first one was insanely hard and the second one was a joke
Always got out early

Just so people know, this professor has 2 entries in ratemyprofessor with a misspelled named. Novonil Sen and Nononil Sen are the same guy. Anyway, do not take this professor. He makes the class way harder for no reason. Easily the worst professor I have ever taken.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things
